Tustin.Irvine High School:
Irvine High School is a public high school located in the city of Irvine in Orange County, California, United States. It is part of the Irvine Unified School District.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the school had an enrollment of 1,968 students and 60 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student-teacher ratio of 30.7.
